history.proof: intros a b c d H1 H2. qauto use: Rplus_assoc, Rplus_ge_compat, Rplus_comm.

original: intros a b c d H1 H2. apply Rplus_ge_compat_l in H2. apply Rplus_ge_compat_r in H1. apply Rplus_ge_compat_r. apply Rplus_ge_compat_l. apply Rplus_ge_compat_l in H2. apply Rplus_ge_compat_l in H1. apply Rplus_ge_compat_r in H2. apply Rplus_ge_compat_r in H1. apply (Rplus_ge_compat a b c d H2 H1).
